title: More Fun With Dick And Shane
description: The houseboy is back...Gillibran Brown returns with more day-to-day tales about love and life with his beloved domestic dictators, Dick and Shane.Being a houseboy to two demanding men is no easy task. There’s more to it than first meets the eye. Gilli has to be all things from chief cock and bottle washer to cook, cleaner and gardener.When he’s good he’s very very good and when he’s bad…he gets a spanking.You’re once again invited to step inside the houseboy’s world to spend a year in the company of Gilli and his men folk.
author: Gillibran Brown
